subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
PGA Championship
Masters Golf Tournament
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: After Sunday’s victory at the P.G.A. Championship, Tiger Woods is five behind Jack Nicklaus’s record of 18 major titles, and future sites could aid him in his chase.
snippet: After Sunday’s victory at the P.G.A. Championship, Tiger Woods is five behind Jack Nicklaus’s record of 18 major titles, and future sites could aid him in his chase.
